title: Michael Jackson's doctor Arnold Klein dies
text:
Michael Jackson's doctor Arnold Klein dies Compiled by Tony Hicks Posted: 10/23/2015 08:29:21 AM PDT Updated: 10/23/2015 08:34:22 AM PDT Michael Jackson's dermatologist and friend Arnold Klein died Thursday at the age of 70, according to TMZ. 
Law Enforcement sources reportedly told the website Klein was admitted to a Palm Springs hospital on Monday, suffering severe abdominal pains. He remained in the hospital until he died at 7:50 Thursday evening. 
Klein treated some of Hollywood's biggest stars, including Dustin Hoffman, Elizabeth Taylor, Sharon Stone, Goldie Hawn, Dolly Parton, and Cher. He was also known a pioneer of Botox. 
But it was his relationship with Jackson that made him a public figure. The two often spent holidays and took vacations together. In this Sept. 22, 2011 photo, dermatologist Arnold Klein poses for a portrait in his office in Beverly Hills, Calif. (AP Photo/Matt Sayles) 
When Jackson died in 2009, TMZ reported Klein injected Jackson with Demerol 51 times during the three months before his death. He also allegedly took Jackson to a number of surgery centers and gave him Propofol, the anesthesia that eventually contributed to his death. 
After Jackson's death, Klein's life went downhill. He ended up declaring bankruptcy. 
Coincidentally, Klein was in the news Thursday in a story about Jackson's son, Prince, implying Jackson wasn't his biological father. For years, Klein has been rumored to be Prince's biological father, though TMZ says it has evidence neither Klein, nor Jackson, is his father. Advertisement
